topic.title: fox jumps above animal
topic.description: What pangrams have a fox jumping above some animal?
topic.narrative: Relevant pangrams have a fox jumping over an animal (e.g., an dog). Pangrams containing a fox that is not jumping or jumps over something that is not an animal are not relevant.

topic.title: multiple animals including a zebra
topic.description: Which pangrams have multiple animals where one of the animals is a zebra?
topic.narrative: Relevant pangrams have at least two animals, one of the animals must be a zebra. Pangrams containing only a zebra are not relevant.

topic.title: Analysis for Android apps
topic.description: Which paper talk about the analysis of android apps?
topic.narrative: Relevant paper talk at least in one line about android apps. Paper containing only apps are not relevant.

topic.title: The University of Amsterdam
topic.description: Which paper are created by the University of Amsterdam?
topic.narrative: Relevant paper are created or at least co-written by the University of Amsterdam. Paper containing only University not relevant.
